name: Hunter X Hunter: Michibi Kareshi Mono
overview: The bandit group “Phantom Brigade” has appeared in Yorksin City, the world's largest auction! They attacked the auction site one after another, and finally developed into a full-scale war with Juro-head, who slams all the mafia. The third installment of the WonderSwan version of Hunter X Hunter is a game version of the “Phantom Brigade” TV show. This time the game is equipped with a multi-site system where you can enjoy the events of York Sin City, which is the stage of the game, from various viewpoints and you can tell the story by selecting the time and character and playing the scenario. You can experience the story that did not exist.
